channel.title: Moparisthebest Offices
channel.description:
[img]http://graphics8.nytimes.com/images/2008/09/16/fashion/18fitness.600.jpg[/img]
What do you guys think of this faggotry? Hey we gotta look out for the fat people but this is a bit too much.
Imagine running while talking on the phone? The people on the other end probably think you are doing you know what.

item.title: Moparisthebest Offices
item.dc:creator: @Frostie21 Frostie21
item.description:
@Frostie21 wrote:

[quote=“maniown, post:8, topic:231813”]I just noticed if u look at the fat mans mouth he looks as if hes out of breath. Hes on the phone

gasp!!! hello gasp!! how many i help u today. gasp!!![/quote]

You’re funny.

item.title: Moparisthebest Offices
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:6, topic:231813”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=305345.msg2448137#msg2448137 date=1221846670]
Seems like a stupid fucking idea if you ask me.

Having them on a cycling machine seems a much better idea… then their head doesn’t actually have to move.
[/quote]

Yeah, they could also use the cycling to produce electricity.[/quote]

And with the money they save from the electricty bill, they could employ a really large dude with a whip to start whipping people when the lights start flickering.

Read full topic
